Kader Amadou Dodo (a mụrụ 5 Eprel 1989) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger nke na-egwu egwu dịka onye mgbachitere AS SONIDEP.
A mụrụ Amadou na Niamey, Niger.
Na Nọvemba 2010 Amadou Kader hapụrụ ASFAN wee banye maka Cotonsport FC de Garoua.  Site na oge 2011/12 ọ na-egwuri egwu na Olympic FC
ọzọ. Ọ nwere ụkwụ aka nri, ogologo 185 cm ma nwee kilogram 75.
Kader na-egwu otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger
Ọ so na ndị otu na asọmpi iko mba ụwa 2010  na 2012 African Nations Cup.
